summary: The Captains is a feature length documentary film written and directed by William Shatner. The film follows Shatner as he interviews the other actors who have portrayed Starship captains within the illustrious science-fiction franchise.
cast: William Shatner|Patrick Stewart|Avery Brooks|Kate Mulgrew|Scott Bakula|Chris Pine|Christopher Plummer|Richard Arnold|Rene Auberjonois|Ira Steven Behr|John de Lancie|Paul Duraso|Jonathan Frakes|Sally Kellerman|Walter Koenig|Chase Masterson|Robert Picardo|Steve Ridolfi|Jeri Ryan|David R. Sparks Jr.|Connor Trinneer|Nana Visitor|Grace Lee Whitney
title: The Captains
